concept.title: How to use the SIP Codec API

conbody.p: This section provides the information about the protocol and error handling related to the SIP Codec API.

section.title: Protocol
section.p: The following illustration shows the steps for creating a CSIPContactHeader instance.

section.title: Error handling
section.p: If an error occurs during a synchronous operation initiated by the client, the function that is called exits with the correct error code.
